re
actions.description:
restores version found in origin/master.  It runs 
			'git restore --source origin/master -- filepath'.
			Options: 
			[ qit re file:someFile.txt, qit re path:path/to/dir ]
			You can also do a batch of files: add the key 'restore'
			to your profile file.  Then, the 'restore' value will
			be a list element, including all of the files that you
			would like to restore.  Finally to run the batch,
			do 'qit re profile:true'.
